Class BaseMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.gjz010.machinebukkit.api.BaseMachine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener, Machine
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContainerMachine, TestMachine

    public abstract class BaseMachine
extends java.lang.Object
implements Machine
    The base class of all the default machines.
